mapper.select:
select supplier_mailbox,supplier_addr,supplier_name,supplier_id from Supplier
and supplier_id like concat('%',#{supplierId},'%') and supplier_name like concat('%',#{supplierName},'%') and supplier_addr like concat('%',#{supplierAddr},'%') and supplier_mailbox like concat('%',#{supplierMailbox},'%')

select count(1) from Supplier
and supplier_id like concat('%',#{supplierId},'%') and supplier_name like concat('%',#{supplierName},'%') and supplier_addr like concat('%',#{supplierAddr},'%') and supplier_mailbox like concat('%',#{supplierMailbox},'%')
